hurry.jqueryutils basic tests
=======================================

Here are some basic tests for hurry.jqueryutils.

Let's set up a way to render URLs; typically the framework has already
done this::

  >>> class Plugin(object):
  ...   def get_library_url(self, library):
  ...     return 'http://localhost/static/%s' % (library.name)
  >>> from hurry.resource import register_plugin
  >>> register_plugin(Plugin())

Render the inclusion::

  >>> from hurry.resource import NeededInclusions
  >>> from hurry.jqueryutils import jqueryutils
  >>> needed = NeededInclusions()
  >>> needed.need(jqueryutils)
  >>> print needed.render()
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://localhost/static/jqueryutils_lib/jquery.utils.css" />
    <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/jquery_lib/jquery-....js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/jqueryutils_lib/jquery.utils.js"></script>

  >>> needed.mode('minified')
  >>> print needed.render()
  <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://localhost/static/jqueryutils_lib/jquery.utils.css" />
    <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/jquery_lib/jquery-....js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/static/jqueryutils_lib/jquery.utils.min.js"></script>
